 11#include <vsip/domain.hpp>

 24#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_CUDA
 25using cuda::Stored_block;

 27
 28/// A Strided is a modifiable, allocatable x-dimensional block
 29/// or 1,x-dimensional block, for a fixed x, that explicitly stores
 30/// one value for each Index in its domain.
 31///
 32/// Template parameters:
 33///   :D: the block's dimension,
 34///   :T: the block's value-type,
 35///   :L: the block's layout policy, encapsulating dimension-ordering,
 36///        packing format, and complex format,
 37///   :M: the block's map type.
 38template <dimension_type D,
 39	  typename T = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
 40	  typename L = Layout<D,
 41			      typename Row_major<D>::type,
 42			      Stride_unit_dense,
 43			      Cmplx_inter_fmt>,
 44	  typename M = Local_map>
 45class Strided;
 46
 47/// Specialization for 1D non-distributed Strided.
 48template <typename T, typename L>
 49class Strided<1, T, L, Local_map> : public Stored_block<T, L>
 50{
 51  typedef Stored_block<T, L> base_type;
 52  typedef typename base_type::uT uT;
 53public:
 54  typedef Local_map map_type;
 55
 56  Strided(Domain<1> const &dom,
 57	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 58  : base_type(dom, map) {}
 59
 60  Strided(Domain<1> const &dom, T value,
 61	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 62  : base_type(dom, value, map) {}
 63
 64  Strided(Domain<1> const &dom, T *const ptr,
 65	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 66  : base_type(dom, ptr, map) {}
 67
 68  Strided(Domain<1> const &dom, uT *const ptr,
 69	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 70  : base_type(dom, ptr, map) {}
 71
 72  Strided(Domain<1> const &dom, uT *const r, uT *const i,
 73	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 74  : base_type(dom, r, i, map) {}
 75
 76  T get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return base_type::get(idx);}
 77
 78  void put(index_type idx, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW { base_type::put(idx, val);}
 79};
 80
 81/// Specialization for 2D non-distributed Strided.
 82template <typename T, typename L>
 83class Strided<2, T, L, Local_map> : public Stored_block<T, L>
 84{
 85  typedef Stored_block<T, L> base_type;
 86  typedef typename base_type::uT uT;
 87public:
 88  typedef Local_map map_type;
 89
 90  Strided(Domain<2> const &dom,
 91	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 92  : base_type(dom, map) {}
 93
 94  Strided(Domain<2> const &dom, T value,
 95	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 96  : base_type(dom, value, map) {}
 97
 98  Strided(Domain<2> const &dom, T *const ptr,
 99	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
100  : base_type(dom, ptr, map) {}
101
102  Strided(Domain<2> const &dom, uT *const ptr,
103	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
104  : base_type(dom, ptr, map) {}
105
106  Strided(Domain<2> const &dom, uT *const r, uT *const i,
107	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
108  : base_type(dom, r, i, map) {}
109
110  T get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return base_type::get(idx);}
111
112  void put(index_type idx, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW { base_type::put(idx, val);}
113
114  T get(index_type idx0, index_type idx1) const VSIP_NOTHROW 
115  { return base_type::get(idx0, idx1);}
116
117  void put(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW
118  { base_type::put(idx0, idx1, val);}
119};

153

155  { return base_type::get(idx0, idx1, idx2);}
156
157  void put(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, index_type idx2, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW
158  { base_type::put(idx0, idx1, idx2, val);}
159};

161/// Specialization for 1D distributed Strided.
162template <typename T, typename L, typename M>
163class Strided<1, T, L, M> : public Distributed_block<Strided<1, T, L>, M>
164{
165  typedef Distributed_block<Strided<1, T, L>, M> base_type;
166  typedef typename base_type::uT uT;
167public:
168  typedef M map_type;
169
170  Strided(Domain<1> const &dom,
171	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
172  : base_type(dom, map) {}
173
174  Strided(Domain<1> const &dom, T value,
175	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
176  : base_type(dom, value, map) {}
177
178  Strided(Domain<1> const &dom, T *const ptr,
179	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
180  : base_type(dom, ptr, map) {}
181
182  Strided(Domain<1> const &dom, uT *const ptr,
183	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
184  : base_type(dom, ptr, map) {}
185
186  Strided(Domain<1> const &dom, uT *const r, uT *const i,
187	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
188  : base_type(dom, r, i, map) {}
189
190  T get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return base_type::get(idx);}
191
192  void put(index_type idx, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW { base_type::put(idx, val);}
193};

195/// Specialization for 2D distributed Strided.
196template <typename T, typename L, typename M>
197class Strided<2, T, L, M> : public Distributed_block<Strided<2, T, L>, M>
198{
199  typedef Distributed_block<Strided<2, T, L>, M> base_type;
200  typedef typename base_type::uT uT;
201public:
202  typedef M map_type;
203

205	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
206  : base_type(dom, map) {}
207

209	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
210  : base_type(dom, value, map) {}
211
212  Strided(Domain<2> const &dom, T *const ptr,
213	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
214  : base_type(dom, ptr, map) {}
215
216  Strided(Domain<2> const &dom, uT *const ptr,
217	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
218  : base_type(dom, ptr, map) {}
219
220  Strided(Domain<2> const &dom, uT *const r, uT *const i,
221	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
222  : base_type(dom, r, i, map) {}
223
224  T get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return base_type::get(idx);}
225
226  void put(index_type idx, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW { base_type::put(idx, val);}
227
228  T get(index_type idx0, index_type idx1) const VSIP_NOTHROW

235/// Specialization for 3D distributed Strided.
236template <typename T, typename L, typename M>
237class Strided<3, T, L, M> : public Distributed_block<Strided<3, T, L>, M>
238{

240  typedef typename base_type::uT uT;
241public:

246  : base_type(dom, map) {}
247

249	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
250  : base_type(dom, value, map) {}
251
252  Strided(Domain<3> const &dom, T *const ptr,
253	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
254  : base_type(dom, ptr, map) {}
255
256  Strided(Domain<3> const &dom, uT *const ptr,
257	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
258  : base_type(dom, ptr, map) {}
259
260  Strided(Domain<3> const &dom, uT *const r, uT *const i,
261	  map_type const &map = map_type()) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
262  : base_type(dom, r, i, map) {}
263
264  T get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return base_type::get(idx);}
265
266  void put(index_type idx, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW { base_type::put(idx, val);}
267
268  T get(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, index_type idx2) const VSIP_NOTHROW 
269  { return base_type::get(idx0, idx1, idx2);}
270
271  void put(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, index_type idx2, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW
272  { base_type::put(idx0, idx1, idx2, val);}
273};
274
275/// Specialize block layout trait for Strided.
276template <dimension_type D, typename T, typename L, typename M>
277struct Block_layout<Strided<D, T, L, M> >
278{
279  static dimension_type const dim = D;
280  typedef Direct_access_tag access_type;
281  typedef L layout_type;
282  typedef typename layout_type::order_type order_type;
283  typedef typename layout_type::pack_type pack_type;
284  typedef typename layout_type::complex_type complex_type;
285};
286
287template <dimension_type D, typename T, typename L, typename M>
288struct Is_pas_block<Strided<D, T, L, M> >
289  : Is_pas_block<Distributed_block<Strided<D, T, L>, M> >
290{};
291
292template <dimension_type D, typename T, typename L>
293struct Is_pas_block<Strided<D, T, L> >
294{
295  static bool const value = false;
296};
297
298template <dimension_type D, typename T, typename L, typename M>
299struct Is_modifiable_block<Strided<D, T, L, M> >
300{
301  static bool const value = true;
302};

307template <dimension_type D, typename T, typename L>
308struct has_device_storage<Strided<D, T, L> > { static bool const value = true;};
